hero.title: Design your next favorite custom shirt

sellonline.title: Sell shirts online through a campaign
sellonline.paragraph1: Sell custom products online by creating your own campaign page where anyone can check out
sellonline.paragraph2: When your campaign ends, we ship products directly to your buyers and send you the profits

openstore.title: Open a free online store
openstore.paragraph: Make it easy for users to browse all of the custom shirts and apparel you’ve designed by creating an online store. They’re free to make and simple to tailor to your brand

support.title: Responsive, and caring customer support
support.paragraph: From the moment you set out to create a custom shirt, our dedicated customer happiness and account management teams have your back every step of the way

start.title: Ready to start
start.paragraph: You’re only one step away from designing your next favorite shirt

hero.title: The easy way to design and sell t-shirts online

examples.title: Sell shirts online without inventory through a ArtVibe campaign. It`s 100% free, you get a fast payout, and we`ll ship your products directly to your buyers

guide.title: How to sell shirts online with ArtVibe
guide.upload: Upload custom artwork or create your design right on ArtVibe
guide.sell: Spread the word on social media while we handle everything else
guide.shipped: Sit back as orders are printed and sent directly to your buyers
guide.payouts: Get a fast payout of 100% of the campaign profits

createstore.title: Create an online t-shirt store
createstore.paragraph: Make it easy for users to browse all of the custom shirts and apparel you`ve designed by creating a free online store. It only takes a few minutes to create and you can customize them to match your brand

catalog.title: Choose the custom apparel you want to sell online
catalog.paragraph: Browse our curated selection of premium t-shirts, hoodies, tank tops and more. Find a variety of styles, sizes, colors and fabric options like ringspun cotton, polyblends, heavyweights and more

uploaddesign.title: Upload your own design or create your own right in our design tool
uploaddesign.paragraph: Upload your own custom artwork or use our library of thousands of free fonts and graphics

prices.title: Set your selling prices
prices.paragraph1: Set your own selling prices and determine your profit margins. As you sell more, your profit margins per shirt will increase
prices.paragraph2: You can also change your campaign settings, such as setting your campaign duration and enabling fundraising

customize.title: Customize your page
customize.paragraph: Connect with your community right from your campaign page. Craft a compelling title and summary and add in videos to bring your story to life

promote.title: Promote and sell your shirts
promote.paragraph1: Spread the word to your audience via social media, your website or whatever other channels work best
promote.paragraph2: Watch sales stats in your seller dashboard while your community visits and buys from your mobile-friendly campaign page

print.title: SHIRTS ARE PRINTED & SHIPPED
print.paragraph: Sit back and relax. We take care of printing and shipping orders to buyers anywhere across the world

start.title: Ready to start selling shirts online
start.text: You're only one step away from designing your next favorite shirt
start.helptext: Read through answers to frequently asked question to help you get started
start.droptext: Prefer to talk to someone? Send us a message, and we`ll be in touch

hero.title: OPEN YOUR ONLINE STORE
hero.paragraph: Your custom designed shirts all in one place

customization.products: All of your products in one place
customization.productstext: Stores make it easy for your customers to shop by bringing all your products together
customization.customizationtext: Customize your store to give it a unique look and feel that compliments your brand
customization.storytext: Introduce yourself to the world and write about who you are or the mission of your organization.

slider.title: We make it easy to create a professional looking store — no matter what your story is
slider.paragraph: Draw inspiration for your online store from the thousands of sellers who are already using stores on ArtVibe to sell their custom apparel

openstore.title: Open your store today
openstore.paragraph: Create an account on ArtVibe and you’ll automatically be able to open your online store

hero.title: T-shirt design templates
hero.paragraph: A collection of free t-shirt templates & design ideas for your custom t-shirt

hero.title: Get instant answers & advice in our Help Center
hero.text: Have your questions answered without having to wait

questions.title: Couldn't find what you're looking for
questions.orderissue: I have an issue with my order
questions.selling: I have a question about selling on ArtVibe

orderquestion.title: We just need some information from you
orderquestion.text: You can find it in the confirmation email or by following these steps

specialquestion.label: WHAT`S GOING ON
specialquestion.getanswer: Get instant answers in our Help Center
specialquestion.questionanswer: Have your questions answered without having to wait
specialquestion.respond: Our team typically responds within 1-2 business days

questions.pricingtip: Remember, selling on ArtVibe is free and base cost is shown in the profits step when setting up your campaign.
questions.design: I need help with my design
questions.designtip: Please provide your name and email and attach the highest quality image possible of your design or inspiration. Supported file types: .AI, .EPS, .PDF, .PNG or .JPG (.AI is preferred). Also, give us an idea of how we can help with your design below.
questions.campaignstip: Remember, we`re unable to extend your campaign`s duration beyond 21 days. However, you can relaunch as many times as you`d like.
questions.othertip: Let us know how we can help. Please provide your email and any additional information related to your specific question below.

generalquestion.getanswer: Get instant answers in our Help Center
generalquestion.questionanswer: Have your questions answered without having to wait
generalquestion.respond: Our team typically responds within 1-2 business days

upload.terms1: By uploading the image, I agree that I have the legal right to reproduce and sell the design, and that I am in full compliance with

uploadguide.tip2: Original vector artwork work best, if you have it
uploadguide.tip3: We support SVG, WEBP, GIF, PNG and JPG files

footer.subtitle: Where the world goes for premium custom shirts
footer.creator: For creators

helpcard.title: Need help
helpcard.paragraph: Have your questions answered without having to wait

campaigndelete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign
campaigndelete.text: All your progress will be gone

campaigndraft.title: Are you sure you want to revert your campaign back to draft
campaigndraft.paragraph: Revert your campaign to draft to edit your design. Buyers won’t be able to check out until you launch the campaign again

designnavbar.text: We'll make sure the artwork looks perfect before painting

crossdialog.title: Your design might be outside of the printable area
crossdialog.paragraph1: Your items will only be printed with the design that is contained inside of the printable area
crossdialog.paragraph2: If you wish to include your entire design in the final print, please ensure all elements of the design are positioned inside of the printable area
